name: The Fall of the Order of the Mollusc
description:
A time-honored band of hand-picked, personal guards for the Suzerain, accompanying them on any military skirmish. In battle, the Order allowed a trickle of adversaries to enter their lines - enough for the despot to experience a sense of achievement. This tactic kept them in favorable stead with generations of overlords. 

Until one ruler grew over-confident of their abilities; grasping out too far, with too little.

And fell.
